title: Cinematic team out here making everyone want to play the game.
body:
While the balance team is getting ready to make all those players quit.

Oh yah... 200+ years of experience. Fucking out here like the player base doesn't have millions of years of combined experience.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

Oh yah btw the only people that don't want less damage is you riot.
